title: sharos
author: sharos
content: Campaign: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5402867.0Archived: https://web.archive.org/web/20220619101029/https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5402867.0Bounty Manager: PersgrataProject's forum account: partyland.ioThe owner is serial scammer. Continuously shart new project and scam peopleâ€™s assets. His running project partyland is a clear scam project. If we search "GPN" on partyland telegram community, many discussion about GPN coin are visible. Itâ€™s mean, his previous project is gpn coin and that's a clear scam. GPN coin already taged on forum:Scammer profile: gpncoinANN: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2940312.0  (Archived)I'm attaching here some screenshots about GPN coin discussion from partyland group.Persgrata is a very unprofessional bounty manager. Run a scam campaign without doing a simple research on forun. This time he start partyland campaign, which is serial scammers project and already multiple active discussion aguest this scammer 1. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5403089.0  Archived

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Because scammers or the like, especially the forums don't have full control in that, not much can help, if a Bounty manager cheats participants without paying tokens or keeps advertising new Bounties.Moreover: @Jawhead999 & @icopress. Already warned for @persgrata, and also, @Rikafipalready warned @partyland.io, if the Bounty participant is not careful and checks, of course at their own risk in this case.In the future, try to become a bounty participant, which is managed by a responsible and trusted member or a bounty that has ESCROW, at least you get the results of your hard work advertising their campaign.100/DT, mark the manager, participants are still following the campaign, why don't you think a little, such managers are prone to fraud.

comments.author: _BlackStar
comments.body: Quote from: sharos on June 19, 2022, 10:33:23 AMPersgrata is a very unprofessional bounty manager. Run a scam campaign without doing a simple research on forun. This time he start partyland campaign, which is serial scammers project and already multiple active discussion aguest this scammer If that's true, tell me what do you want? Are you one of the participants of this bounty or just exposing the scams of various shitcoin projects like that?If indeed what you accuse the Persgrata is true, then I hope you are the first to put a negative tag on their profile. I don't know if Persgrata did due diligence on the project before asking the public to promote it, but based on Persgrata's reputation I believe so far it has received negative tag due to its poor management of promotions.

comments.author: Pandu Geddon
comments.body: OP, @Persgrata account already has a very clear negative tag. and the projects s/he campaigns for.Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=2407868 Jawhead999Â  Â  2020-12-31Â  Â  ReferenceÂ  Â  Unprofessional bounty manager, multiply managing scam projectif there is still a bounty hunter who believes and registers the bounty campaign that s/he handles, of course, that is a risk that must be borne by the bounty hunter.if bounty hunters want to think a little smarter by ignoring bounty manager accounts like @Persgrata, I don't think this problem needs to be raised again.

But, campaign is still running. Look like, promoting a scam is festival.Quote from: _BlackStar on June 19, 2022, 01:28:05 PMQuote from: sharos on June 19, 2022, 10:33:23 AMPersgrata is a very unprofessional bounty manager. Run a scam campaign without doing a simple research on forun. Just found this campaign and some information about this project. I'm just exposing this scam.Quote from: Pandu Geddon on June 19, 2022, 02:15:06 PMOP, @Persgrata account already has a very clear negative tag. and the projects s/he campaigns for.Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=2407868 Jawhead999 Â  Â 2020-12-31 Â  Â Reference Â  Â Unprofessional bounty manager, multiply managing scam projectif there is still a bounty hunter who believes and registers the bounty campaign that s/he handles, of course, that is a risk that must be borne by the bounty hunter.if bounty hunters want to think a little smarter by ignoring bounty manager accounts like @Persgrata, I don't think this problem needs to be raised again.Actually i was a bounty hunter, so i know their mind. If there was a flag then a warning will be displayed on Persgrata's campaign, Then hunters would not participate anymore. Maximum hunters don't lookup user trust, just continuously participate and participate, just worthless.

comments.author: nliban
comments.body: Hi,Thanks for your actions.It started even before this topic targeting Fox team.I'm the one who has initially exposed Partyland Owner for his repeated scams. I'm currently writing a complete topic about ALL his scams and methods. It tooks time, the guy is a professional and has a lot of scam businesses.Scam Accusation topic is coming soon with all the necessary proofs.About Persgrata, I already alerted him and gave him all the proofs on Telegram (same as I did with all the others BM), and despite all of this, he decided to ban me and to continue to run the campaign anyway.Some screenshots : https://imgur.com/a/plpTWTi (more in the topic I'm writing)

Itâ€™s proof he also a scammer. War Between scammer, not butQuoteBut i understand that. Fox take his Salary in token. He give coinsbit deposit address for receiving his salary. After that he also take bounty allocation like escrowed campaign. And then fox transfer the bounty allocation to his coinsbit exchange and then dump the token by selling.After scamming the bounty allocation, Fox start blackmailing the owner. comments.author: nliban
comments.created_time: July 02, 2022, 03:10:41 PMLast edit: July 06, 2022, 03:12:51 PM by nliban
comments.body: New account created by this bounty manager to hide the flag added to his previous account.I added a flag on his new account as well : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3488354The telegram group associated shows that most of the bounty supported ends with no answer/no payment.

comments.author: DVlog
comments.body: I can see that BM already had two red trusts. Now it is up to the worker whether they want to join a project managed by this BM or not. I think everything had been done that is possible for the forum.I saw another post about party land and this serial scammer. If that BM promotes this campaign despite knowing that it is a scam then it's his fault. But I can see from the previous history of this BM that a lot of campaigns managed by this BM were legit.

comments.author: nliban
comments.body: Quote from: DVlog on July 03, 2022, 10:01:55 AMI can see that BM already had two red trusts. Now it is up to the worker whether they want to join a project managed by this BM or not. I think everything had been done that is possible for the forum.I saw another post about party land and this serial scammer. If that BM promotes this campaign despite knowing that it is a scam then it's his fault. But I can see from the previous history of this BM that a lot of campaigns managed by this BM were legit.The BM created a new account to avoid the red trust feedbacks. New account is not tagged yet. Most of hunters don't read anything and only trust what the BM is saying. He has a responsibility about what he is promoting. But in this case, he is only interested by the payment he receives, no matter what the project is.

comments.author: istiak2277
comments.body: Why don't you guys tell the admin directly not to promote a scam project? If hunters do not want to work for a campaign, then BM must halt that campaign. But I can see there are still a lot of users actively working on that project. It's a free forum and the only thing DT members do is to red tag that BM if he doesn't want to listen, which they already did. So make a group in telegram and report that project on all social media.

comments.author: nliban
comments.body: Quote from: istiak2277 on July 03, 2022, 04:10:15 PMWhy don't you guys tell the admin directly not to promote a scam project? If hunters do not want to work for a campaign, then BM must halt that campaign. But I can see there are still a lot of users actively working on that project. It's a free forum and the only thing DT members do is to red tag that BM if he doesn't want to listen, which they already did. So make a group in telegram and report that project on all social media.I told the admin already and gave him all the proofs.. So he banned me on Telegram and kept running the campaign anyway as he has been paid by the scam CEO.. Only the hunters (I'm not participating in any bounty, I'm only exposing this scam) will not get anything, but the BM doesn't care about the distribution.The BM created a new account here to get rid of the previous red flag so his new account (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3488354) should be flagged as well.I've already made a scam accusation topic and a telegram channel to post about Partyland scam : https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=3488354

comments.author: Lestmecheck
comments.body: I'm a bounty hunter, I haven't been on this manager's project for a long time because I see that he is a cheating manager. Once I DM reported that he intentionally cheated by inserting a new ID in the spreadsheet, but he banned me
